lines.text: It's not the heat, it's the humility.
Hey, Mr. Moto! Indemnify me for these mugs!
Please release him, Colonel. He is my assistant... self-appointed.
The art of professional wrestling consists of two parts groan, two parts acting, and but one little part of skill.

[noticing the intercom is switched on]
Is this a private conversation or are we broadcasting?

[amazed by Moto's martial arts abilities]
If you was a pro, I could never get to be world champion.
You may depend on me retaining my amateur status.

[in awe of judo techniques]
Hey, I've seen everything, but a little shrimp like you throwing The Sailor gets me!
What I've used is simple, but it has served me well on many occasions.

[as Moto lays in pain on a gurney]
Well, Mr. Moto, you picked a bad time to get afflicted.

[Marr sadistically presses his foot on Moto's appendix]
Unfortunately we cannot select a time for our afflictions.

[referring to the mysterious Puerto Rican swampland]
You see, it isn't just ghosts you have to contend with but the suspicions of a dangerously ignorant people.

[to Twister]
You can obtain the confidence of criminals when one is branded a criminal.
You've been a great help, and I want to thank you.
I wanna thank you too, pal. That hold yuh showed me I'm gonna keep in my wretlin' "prepatory."
Mr. Moto!
Good evening, everybody.
He's a detective. He's come here to arrest my father. You can't take him! He was framed! Please you promise me to protect us until dad's prove innocent.
Don't be so alarmed. Moto was only an impersonation. Very convenient for the moment.
I - I don't understand.
Just a penny-ante gangster playin' detective.
[Joan looked up the newspaper of San Juan Tribune, "Governor Slain by Bogus Mr. Moto! Notorious Killer Shimura and Accomplice Make Sensational Escape". They broke out of jail and resisting arrest]
Shimura. You murdered the Governor. It was you, you framed my father. Now we can go back to San Juan. This proves dad innocent.
Sure, sure. Now you go back to your cabin and looked after that fever. I'll take care of this.
But we can't waste anytime.
Bill, take her back to her cabin.
